an5.28:2.4: nhāpako → nahāpako (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | nhānīyacuṇṇāni → nahāniyacuṇṇāni (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); nhāniyacuṇṇāni (sya-all) | Sāyaṃ → saṃsā (si); sā’ssa (pts-vp-pli1ed) | nhānīyapiṇḍi → nahāniyapiṇḍi (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | paggharinī → paggharati (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an5.28:3.4: ubbhidodako → ubbhitodako (sya-all, km, mr) | dhāraṃ nānuppaveccheyya → devo ca na kālena … anuppaveccheyya (pts-vp-pli1ed)
an5.28:6.2: aññova aññaṃ → añño vā aññaṃ (bj, sya-all, km); añño vā aññaṃ vā (si); añño aññaṃ (?)
an5.28:7.1: kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu → evaṃ bhāvite kho bhikkhave (sya-all)
